about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Mahindra Logistics Limited is end-to-end logistics solution and service provider. Mahindra Logistics is part of Mahindra Group (M&M), one of India's leading corporate groups with operations across several industries and countries. Before 2008 the logistics business of M&M was operated as a division of M&M serving the transportation and distribution, warehousing and in-factory logistics requirements of M&M.

The logistics solution of the company includes transportation and distribution, warehousing, in-factory logistics and value added services to its clients.

Company also provide people transportation solutions and services across India to over 100 domestic and multinational companies operating in the IT, ITeS, business process outsourcing, financial services, consulting and manufacturing industries in 12 cities and over 120 clients.

Company's subsidiary, 2X2 Logistics, provides logistics and transportation services to OEMs to carry finished automobiles from the manufacturing locations to stockyards or directly to the distributors through specially designed vehicles.

Company's other subsidiary, Lords, provides international freight forwarding services for exports and imports, customs brokerage operations, project cargo services and charters.

faqs.question: What is the Mahindra Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mahindra Logistics IPO is a main-board IPO of 19332346 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹829.36 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹429 per share. The minimum order quantity is 34.

The IPO opens on October 31, 2017, and closes on November 2, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mahindra Logistics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mahindra Logistics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mahindra Logistics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mahindra Logistics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mahindra Logistics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mahindra Logistics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mahindra Logistics IPO opens on October 31, 2017 and closes on November 2, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mahindra Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: Mahindra Logistics IPO lot size is 34, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,586.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mahindra Logistics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mahindra Logistics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mahindra Logistics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mahindra Logistics IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 8, 2017, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, November 9, 2017. Check the Mahindra Logistics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mahindra Logistics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mahindra Logistics IPO listing date is on Friday, November 10, 2017.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Mahindra Logistics IPO is subscribed 7.9 times on November 2 2017 10:00:00 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 6.1 times in the retail category 15.6 times in the QIB category and 2.07 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
